description: This Dart source file defines an AuthService class responsible for handling user authentication processes such as registration, login, JWT token storage, and token retrieval in a Flutter application. It interacts with a FastAPI backend via HTTP requests and uses FlutterSecureStorage for secure token storage.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A class providing static methods for user authentication, registration, token management, and related network operations.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts user login with given email and password, fetches and stores JWT token if successful.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with the provided email and password.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks whether the user currently has a stored JWT token, indicating authentication status.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes the stored JWT token, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: _getJwtToken
methods.description: Reads JWT token from secure storage.
